It's always situational, great thing about RTS.
My standard start is building two supply pads follows by two power generators. In the meantime I use my two units to collect nearby resources, I upgrade my two generators and build a barracks then decide whether I need to build more marines, build snipers or upgrade my base for tier two units!
I normally play as forge, helps win against rushes!
Just letting you know I play wow.

It's really bad. I'm on the Xbox and I've had to stop playing due to bad servers. My win loss ratio was just getting ruined because of constantly losing connection.
I played halo wars one for all the 8 years it's been out, over 5 times the amount of exp needed for general, and I can't play hw2.
I've moved onto a beta game ATM which has better connectivity than the PREMIUM game I bought for 70..

Something I do to combat this problem is have a few weapons and armour in my storage ready for when it happens. Arm the dweller you need in said room and kill the threat, then remove weapons and armour and repeat! Perhaps others may feel this way is bad, all I can say it does fine for me! I only have 29 dwellers atm too.
